About SOFRACOM

SOFRACOM is based in Monastir, Tunisia. We provide a complete package for the marine community: a well-stocked store and a services division. We’re close to Marina Monastir and the Port de pêche, enabling quick deliveries throughout the day.

  • • Premium marine paints: JOTUN, HEMPEL, INTERNATIONAL, AKZONOBEL
  • • Products & tools: SIKA, SHELL oils, VARTA batteries, BOSCH machinery
  • • Network of pros: carpenters, electricians, mechanics, upholsterers, welders
  • • Expert support for quick fixes & major refits

We stock leading marine brands and can quickly order what’s not on-hand via established suppliers.

Services

From quick fixes to full refits. Our partner haul-out facility is located in Monastir’s Port de pêche, about 1 mile from Monastir Marina.

Antifouling & Painting

Surface prep, primer, coatings. Correct systems for local waters.

Gelcoat & Fiberglass

Crack repair, fairing, color matching, finish restoration.

Deck & Hardware

Non-skid renewal, teak work, fittings, sealants (SIKA).

Electrical & Mechanical

Batteries (VARTA), engines (SHELL oils), wiring, diagnostics.

Polishing & Protection

Cut, polish, sealants, corrosion & chain galvanizing support.

Haul-out Coordination

Partner yard in Port de pêche. Free quote on request.

  1. 1. Share your project

    Tell us what you need: size, material, timeline.

  2. 2. Quote & scheduling

    We propose the system, products, and plan.

  3. 3. Execution

    Professionals carry out the work with our supplies.

  4. 4. Delivery

    Inspection, guidance, and after-care products.

FAQ

Do you deliver to the marina?

+
Yes, we’re nearby and can arrange quick deliveries to Marina Monastir.

Can I request a free quote?

+
Absolutely. Use the contact form below or call us to discuss your project.

Do you stock everything shown?

+
Not all items are in stock at all times, but we can order quickly via suppliers.
